job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongJob Title brbrstrongData Science Delivery Behavior Profile Analyst I II IIIbrbrstrong Location brbrstrongAtlanta GAbrbrstronguSummarybrbrustrongMather Economics seeks new graduates to earlystage career individuals who have strong technical skills with the ability to write efficient and maintainable code Candidates should have experience in data cleaning manipulation and management through coursework fellowships independent research andor internships Individuals should be detailoriented organized and have a good understanding of econometric modeling and codingbrbrstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliHandle data operational tasks such as running modifying and automating recurring processes using SQL and PythonliliApply econometric modeling coefficients to client datasets using STATAliliPull and manipulate data for client requested reportingliliWrite queries to pull output for AB testing results to be used in client reportingliliMaintain data quality assurance on a regular basis for data feeds from clients and to clientsliliProblemsolve data or process issuesliliCreate and updating health reporting to check for data quality assurance anomalies and process successliliCommunicate with consulting team on operational tasks and timelinesliliCommunicate with team on key performance insights KPI on health reporting and quality acceptance thresholdsliliAdjust recurring processes and data to account for any errors outside of quality acceptance thresholdsbrliulstronguBasic Qualificationsbrustrongulli Candidates should have a fouryear degree from an accredited college or university Typically we like to see individuals who have degrees in economics computer science or mathematics Degrees should be accompanied with an internship or work experience that relates to the degree and position Their technical skills should include Stata SQL and Python brliulstronguOther DetailsbrbrustrongDuring the interview process we are looking for people who can successfully complete a series of technical assessments They should have well thought out answers and be able to explain how they arrived to each one It should be evident that they critically selfreviewed their work for errors typos and inconsistencies They should have attempted to answer questions they werebrbrunsure about by utilizing the resources around them like Google This position requires the individual to be an independent problem solver with critical thinking and reasoning skills who can consistently think outside of the box Individuals should be friendly and easy to talk to with an overall positive attitude We are looking for candidates with hard technical skills who are also effective communicators Candidates should show real interest in the position and industry meaning we want to see people who enjoy being in the weeds with data and writing efficient and maintainable codebrbrIn terms of culture we are seeking individuals who stress they want a fastpaced team focused atmosphere have a desire to continually learn and improve technical skills and show desire to grow into future positions with the company They must want to come to Mather Economics because data manipulation and management sounds interesting to thembrbrAfter they are hired we want to see them interact during training engaged throughout the process and show general aptitude in understanding the initial requirements They should take what they learned and apply it immediately ask questions as needed and learn from the mistakes they make As they continue to develop they should have a strong grasp on stress testing their output preparing data for effective analysis independently identifying problems and creating solutions and being a part of the teambrulliEnjoys work and stress test outputliliStatistical and quantitative thinkingliliAbility to independently identify problems and create solutionsliliSelfmotivatedliliIndustry knowledgeliliAbility to prepare
